1.question: Does your agency use an electronic accounting software system (as opposed to manual)?

2.question: Has your agency recently implemented any new or substantially changed systems, for example, financial management or accounting systems? (If yes, please explain.)

3.question: Does your agency have a written Accounting and Financial Reporting policy?

4.question: Does your agency have a written Personnel policy (to include travel reimbursement, fringe benefits, etc.)?

5.question: Which of the following aspects of the OJT training program were explained to you?

6.question: How did you learn about this OJT program?

7.question: What are your performance based strengths (speed, strength, power, agility, balance, conditioning, etc.)?

8.question: Do you have any questions, comments or concerns?
